raw: This is as far south as you can go on Phuket Island. The Andaman sea stretches out in front of you as you get a 270 degree viewing angle.The Big Buddha can be seen over the crest of a hill in between.Unfortunately the Maritime Museum appears to be closed for renovations. Outside however the scale models of the Royal Navy of Thailand along with a very imposing statue of Rama V are visible.The rotunda with all the various elephant statutes is a sight to behold.

raw: Sunsets never gets old from wherever you see it. However, Promthep Cape will make that experience unforgettable. It's a viewpoint in Phuket overlooking the Andaman sea and is surrounded by water from three sides. raw: This is one of the best place in Phuket and a must visit if you are there. It takes about 30 minutes to travel there by car from Patong. The view of the cape from the top is amazing. However it is still one of the most romantic place around. If you want to impress your girl, give this a try!
